name: Oretachi no Monogatari (By Jojohime)
description:
A short 30 days dating game made using RPG maker, explore the island of glenn, meet new friends, go on dating and save everyone from turning into cats! (This is a beta version to test for bug, not the final version, more content may be added to the final one) 

- An appreciation game dedicated to supporters of Jojohime Streams and Cosplays (FB)! Meet characters who are based on familiar figures from the stream! 

- Beta tester please pm Jojohime Streams and Cosplay FB page before end of nov 2022 to update about in game bugs! 

HOW TO START GAME?

1) Download the file below ( Choose Mac,Windows, or Android)

2) Click into the Zip File and search for game.exe or any game related icon. 

3) Click on it and start enjoying the game! 

BUG FIX UPDATE

8.11.2022 - FIXED KENSHIN LOOPING SPEECH IN DORM
